methodology: Scientific name of plant species of which the traits were measured.
We measured corolla depth using sliding callipers (precision 0.01 mm) on herbarium specimens.

description: Number of flowers per plant invidual
methodology: We estimated the total number of flowers per plant individual on the study sites. On plants with very large flower availability, we counted the number of flowers for representative branches and used these to estimate the number of flowers of the whole plant.
We measured plant height for each species on the study sites using a laser range finder (precision 1 m).
